titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey certain real properties of the Corps of Engineers in the State of Ohio to local governments of the State of Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/4/1996--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to: (1) the city of Steubenville, Ohio, certain real property located at the Pike Island Locks and Dam; and (2) Kinsman Township, Trumbull County, Ohio, certain real property located at the Shenango River Lake project.
